eu.cqse.check.framework.preprocessor.c.new_c_preprocessor

Class PreprocessorTokenReplacement

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.cqse.check.framework.preprocessor.c.new_c_preprocessor.PreprocessorTokenReplacement
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PreprocessorConditionalTokenReplacement, PreprocessorErrorTokenReplacement

    public class PreprocessorTokenReplacement
extends java.lang.Object
    A replacement for part of a token sequence. Contains which tokens are to be replaced (start/end index) and the replacement tokens list. Also contains a NewCPreprocessor.PreprocessorUsageInformation ("which macros were used to compute this replacement").

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      NewCPreprocessor.PreprocessorUsageInformation preprocessorUsageInformation
      Usage information gathered during generation of this replacement.

    • Constructor Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int countReplacedTokens()
      Returns the number of tokens in the original token stream that should be replaced by this PreprocessorTokenReplacement.
      static PreprocessorTokenReplacement createSingleTokenRemoval(int originalTokenIndex)
      Creates a new PreprocessorTokenReplacement that removes the token at the given index with no replacement.

        public final NewCPreprocessor.PreprocessorUsageInformation preprocessorUsageInformation

                                    NewCPreprocessor.PreprocessorUsageInformation preprocessorUsageInformation)

    • Method Detail

      • createSingleTokenRemoval

        public static PreprocessorTokenReplacement createSingleTokenRemoval(int originalTokenIndex)
        Creates a new PreprocessorTokenReplacement that removes the token at the given index with no replacement. This sets an empty NewCPreprocessor.PreprocessorUsageInformation in the replacement.

      • replacesOriginalTokenIndex

        public boolean replacesOriginalTokenIndex(int originalTokenIndex)
        Returns whether the token at the given index in the original token list will be replaced/removed when applying this replacement.

      • countReplacedTokens

        public int countReplacedTokens()
        Returns the number of tokens in the original token stream that should be replaced by this PreprocessorTokenReplacement. We allow PreprocessorTokenReplacements with originalTokensEndIndex == originalTokensStartIndex, so this can return 0. Such 0-length replacements always have an empty list of replacementTokens. (Normally, they are PreprocessorErrorTokenReplacements).

      • setTokensOriginAndOffset

        public void setTokensOriginAndOffset(IToken originalSourceToken)
        Replaces all tokens in replacementTokens with a new token that is identical except for
        1. offset and line number (taken from the parameter)
        2. origin (set to MacroHandlingCPreprocessorBase.MACRO_ORIGIN
